title: Polish Filmmaker To Bring Her Political Eye To 'House Of Cards'
teaser: Polish filmmaker Agnieszka Holland, whose films explore fascism and communist oppression, is guest-directing the new season of House of Cards. Host Indira Lakshaman asks Holland about the political undercurrents in her work.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
